channel.title: Pickup command owner-admin help

item.title: Pickup command owner-admin help
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Okey. I guess you’re on use of , somewhat , silabian sources (e.g. ReapageScape; AllstarScape, etc).
If I’m right, you must try use this:
::pickup ##### 1
^^^^^
Basic Silabian pickup codes , are in contain of 5 numbers. Try that (if you right , that you using silabian ones):
::pickup 15333 1 - armadyl godsword with silab
::pickup 00995 25000000 - coins x25m.

Hope my post helps you. PM if ain’t works, i will try help!

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command owner-admin help
item.dc:creator: @dragonboy5678 dragonboy5678
item.description:
@dragonboy5678 wrote:

Sorry about this but i found out that it is a 317 server and the code is:

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");

When ever i Try it spawn it wont sawn nuthen at all and i have tryed with other ::pickup command for a 317 server and it wont work an the source i went with is Naderpkz

Read full topic
